contest-event.event-date:
July 20, 2013 D New Zealand National Championships (A Grade)
New Zealand National Championships (A Grade) 10 Sacred, March, Set Test and Own Choice Contest New Zealand National Championships new-zealand-national-championships-a-grade
New Zealand
A Grade
The Promised Land
New Plymouth, Taranaki, New Zealand Test Piece (The Promised Land) In the event of tied placing, the band scoring higher on the test-piece takes precidence. Outstanding Soloist on set piece: Mark Davey (Trom) Wellington Brass Outstanding Section on set piece: Full Cornets, Wellington Brass Outstanding Cornet on own choice: John Lewis Dalewool Auckland Brass
July 25, 2013, 3:26 a.m. Aug. 1, 2013, 2:57 a.m.
1 Wellington Brass Band David Bremner Revelation
2 City of Sails Auckland Brass Nigel Weeks Music of the Spheres
3 Woolston Brass Graham Hickman Audivi Media Nocte
4 Canterbury Brass Tyme Marsters Music for Battle Creek
5 Ascot Park Hotel Brass Dwayne Bloomfield Earthrise
6 Brass Wanganui Bruce Jellyman Between the Moon and Mexico
7 St Kilda Brass Peter Adams Vienna Nights
8 Waitakere Auckland Brass Russell Gray Spiriti
9 North Shore Brass Colin Clark ...Dove Descending
10 Marlborough District Brass Kevin Moseley The Land of the Long White Cloud - Aotearoa
